name: Anian Ziegler
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I've been building a startup on JS and Typescript for three years now and am mostly actively developing on node in Typescript or doing a lot of DevOps and Automation for our team.
what_can_i_contribute: I'd love to talk about ObjectionJS, Node and Typescript and maybe also about automation with Concourse CI if there is interest for that.
